tosdr.case: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
quoteText:
Where we rely on our legitimate interests to process your personal data, you have the right to object.

If you have any questions about or need further information concerning the legal basis on which we collect and use your personal information, please contact us at privacyquestions@cloudflare.com.
